title: Eddie Is Teaching His Son A Lesson with Bologna Sandwiches + Bobby Gives a Listener a Big Gift + Amy Has Random Money Deposited into Her Account
itunes:title: Eddie Is Teaching His Son A Lesson with Bologna Sandwiches + Bobby Gives a Listener a Big Gift + Amy Has Random Money Deposited into Her Account
description:
Eddie is trying to teach his son a lesson by only giving him bologna sandwiches to eat because he’s been getting bad grades for 6 months. A caller recently left a voicemail asking Bobby for his drone that he never used. He calls in today and Bobby surprises him. Amy shares that she was randomly given money into her account and Lunchbox was jealous.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
